basic_socket_acceptor::accept

Accept a new connection. 

template<
    typename Protocol1,
    typename SocketService>
void accept(
    basic_socket< Protocol1, SocketService > & peer,
    typename enable_if< is_convertible< Protocol, Protocol1 >::value >::type *  = 0);
